name: 东方梦想终点~Touhou Fantasy destination
name_original: 东方梦想终点~Touhou Fantasy destination
description:
What kind of game is this?
This is a second fan game of Oriental project. This work contains different settings from the original, so please pay attention to the players who feel uncomfortable about it.

What is the game mode of this game?
This is a visual novel game with two routes and double endings, which can be cleared in half an hour.

Synopsis When faith ceases, when fantasy disappears, is it fantasy, disappearing in the past or starting over, embracing all of people, no matter what, can't go back to the past.
